Serialized Form

  • Package controller

    • Class controller.StandardServerController

      class StandardServerController extends UnicastRemoteObject implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • activeUsers
          Map<User,LobbyController> activeUsers
          The association between a user and the lobby it has joined
        • gameControllers
          Map<LobbyController,GameController> gameControllers
          The association between a lobby and the corresponding game controller
        • lobbies
          Map<String,LobbyController> lobbies
          The association between a lobby and its ID
        • users
          Map<ClientInterface,User> users
          The association between a client and a user on the server, it is assumed that only well authenticated clients have a user association
